snippet: Mr. Bendukidze, a biologist and later a wealthy businessman in the final years of the Soviet Union, became an architect of economic and governmental changes in his native Georgia.
abstract: Kakha Bendukidze, biologist who became wealthy businessman in final years of Soviet Union and, later, architect of sweeping economic and governmental changes as senior official in his native Georgia, dies at age 58.

byline.contributor: Neil MacFarquhar contributed reporting from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Bendukidze, a biologist and later a wealthy businessman in the final years of the Soviet Union, became an architect of economic and governmental changes in his native Georgia.

headline.main: Kakha Bendukidze Dies at 58; Pushed Post-Soviet Market Change
headline.print_headline: Kakha Bendukidze, 58; Pushed Post-Soviet Market Change
